extendedInfo.description: The KC Library app makes it easy to find and discover books, place holds, renew items, get information about our locations, and keep up with the great events happening at the library.Features:â¢ Search for books, music, and more in the online catalog.â¢ Place and manage holds.â¢ Renew items you have checked out.â¢ Get hours, locations, and maps for all locations.â¢ Find the latest special events, classes, story times, and other programs.â¢ Ask a librarian a question via phone or email.â¢ Read our blogs for book reviews and stories from behind the scenes.â¢ Connect with the library on social networksSearch Tip: When searching for items in the catalog, you only need to enter the first few letters of each word. So, for Mark Twainâs Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, just enter âma tw ad hu.â

reviews.title: Can\'t renew on android app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve loved this app the last year but this past month the renew option on app won\'t work on my phone now and have to use website. Ugh.
reviews.author: Sally King

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is so user friendly and helpful. I love that i can get ebooks and eaudiobooks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app makes it so much more easier to access my library account from my phone. Before the app I had trouble with the catalog. It kept cutting off the end of the page in my browser. This is way better. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: An amazing app for book lovers that frequent the KC Public library.  Talking with a friend and get a book recommended..the clicks and it is reserved!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hooray!
reviews.comment: Nice job on this KC Library - easy to check account status and do renewals, which is what I\'ll use it the most for. Easy to use events calendar is nice too. The e-book functionality seems to work ok but could be made easier in future releases. Great first effort though - if you\'re a library user, grab this one for sure. Thanks also for making it SD-movable, which many developers don\'t do until they\'re bugged about it endlessly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you for making this app. So much easier than using the website on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It makes it so easy to renew my account and i love the ebook and audio book feature. This is brilliant!
reviews.author: A Google User
